term_condition.list: Cookie: small amount of data generated by a website and saved by your web browser. It is used to identify your browser,provide analytics, remember information about you such as your language preference or login information.

Company: when this policy mentions “Company,” “we,” “us,” or “our,” it refers to PT Alfaro Garda DIgital Nusantara, Ruko Daan Mogot Baru Jl. Bedugul 1A no 14 Kalideres, Jakarta Barat – 11840 that is responsible for your information under this Eula.
Country: where Funtravia or the owners/founders of Funtravia are based, in this case is Indonesia
Device: any internet connected device such as a phone, tablet, computer or any other device that can be used to visit Funtravia and use the services
Service: refers to the service provided by Funtravia as described in the relative terms (if available) and on this platform
Third-party service: refers to advertisers, contest sponsors, promotional and marketing partners, and others who provide our content or whose products or services we think may interest you
Website: Funtravia site, which can be accessed via this URL:
You: a person or entity that is registered with Funtravia to use the Services
